session_summary: Dave and Calvin caught up at 2:55 pm on 31 August, 2023. Calvin shared his amazing experience performing on a big stage and shooting a video in Miami for his new album. Dave showed support and praised Calvin's unique guitar, symbolizing his journey and passion for music. They discussed the importance of staying true to one's style and being unique in music. Dave encouraged Calvin to keep sharing his unique talent with the world.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a crowd of people at a concert with their hands in the air
conversation_turns.text: Hey Calvin! Long time no chat! How was the end of your tour? I bet it was amazing!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a crowd of people watching a concert with a large screen
conversation_turns.text: Hey Dave! The tour was amazing! I was so pumped from all the energy from the audience. This pic totally captures how I felt. Such an amazing time!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that looks amazing! How was it performing on that big stage?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Performing on such a big stage was a dream come true! The energy was incredible and I felt on top of the world. It was seriously surreal.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that must have been an incredible experience! Congrats on achieving such an awesome moment!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a camera and a video camera on a beach
conversation_turns.query: album video shoot set crew members
conversation_turns.text: Cool! Last weekend I started shooting a video for my new album - can't wait for you to check it out! Look how great it was!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin! Can't wait to see it. Will it be shot on location?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: We're doing the shoot in Miami and picked an awesome beach. It's going to have some epic visuals!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great, Calvin! The beaches in Miami are awesome - can't wait to see them!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Oh man, they are amazing! I love the Miami vibe, it's perfect for the vid. Can't wait to show you!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Looking forward to it! I'm excited to see the vibe and the location. Let me know if you need any help with props or anything else for the video. I'm here to support you!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! I'll let you know if I need any assistance with props or anything else. Your support is much appreciated.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a guitar with a octopus on it
conversation_turns.text: Sure, let me know when, I'm here to lend a hand. It's great to fuel your ideas. Remember that photo you sent me once? Love how this guitar shows our different artistic styles.

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Yes Dave, I remember! I had this custom made by my Japanese artist friend. It's got an octopus on it, which represents my love for art and the sea. It's one of my favorites!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: That's a great guitar, Calvin! Love the design, it's so unique and special.

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Cheers, mate! Really appreciate it. This guitar means so much to me; it's a reminder of my passion for music and the amazing friendships I've made.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Calvin, this instrument obviously means a lot to you - it's like a representation of your journey, your passion for music, and the friendships you've made. Amazing!

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a guitar with a purple glow on it
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, Dave! It's like every mark and strum holds a story. Take a look.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: That guitar has a gorgeous purple hue. Why did you make it so shiny?

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: I got it customized with a shiny finish because it gives it a unique look. Plus, it goes with my style.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Good pick! The customized purple glow gives it a unique look that really stands out.

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, dude! I dig how it's so unique. It's totally my style!

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.text: Looks great on you! Your unique style really stands out in your music and playing.

conversation_turns.speaker: Calvin
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Dave! Trying to stay true to myself and be unique in my music is something that I value, so it's really great to hear that you appreciate it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Dave
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a man working on a car engine in a garage
conversation_turns.text: Definitely, staying true to yourself and your style is vital. It makes you unique and your music stand out. Keep it real, bud. You've got something great to give the world.

Calvin: Calvin begins shooting a video for his new album on the Miami beach.

Dave: Dave expresses support for Calvin's music and creative endeavors.
Dave mentions a guitar that shows their different artistic styles, which he appreciates.
Calvin: Calvin completed a tour where he performed on a big stage and felt on top of the world.
Calvin started shooting a video for his new album in Miami at an awesome beach for epic visuals.
Calvin had a guitar custom made with an octopus design by his Japanese artist friend, representing his love for art and the sea.
Calvin values being true to himself and his unique style in his music.
